__e: My boss is a real pain, and he won't like if I don't do a thorough exam.
And since I can't drink anymore, the pain is unbearable, and, so, if anyone can help me out, I found a doctor who can fix me up for next to nothing...
But he's my unbearable boss who is now going to tell the entire goddamn office that my wife can't get through a single dinner without bringing up our personal family problems.
Look, I didn't tell you what happened because A): It's none of your business and B): Your reaction to what happened is bound to be even more annoying than your reaction to not knowing.
Yeah, and ever since you became captain, you've been a bigger pain in our asses than before.
And you're out late, waiting for him to go to bed so you can avoid the uncomfortable silence when you get home.
